text: Abenteuer in Bamsdorf is an East German adventure film directed by Konrad Petzold. It was released in 1958. ==Cast== * Charlotte Küter as Oma * Bernd Kuss as Toni * Peter Schmidt as Klaus * Petra Kyburg as Rita * Klaus Böhme as Rolf * Günter Wolf as Stippel * Hans-Joachim Pfeil as Michel * Sylvia Hunger as Bärbel * Claudia Seidel as Reni ==External links== * Category:1958 films Category:1950s children's adventure films Category:German adventure films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:German children's films Category:German sequel films
title: Abenteuer in Bamsdorf
